plot: The laughable experiences of a number of people who meet with various unfortunate accidents on an icy day, when walks are slippery.
title: An Icy Day
plot_es: The laughable experiences of a number of people who meet with various unfortunate accidents on an icy day, when walks are slippery.
plot_en: The laughable experiences of a number of people who meet with various unfortunate accidents on an icy day, when walks are slippery.
